overview:
Rob joined Highland in 2003, and serves as Vice President, Global Infrastructure. He is responsible for the firmsâ€™ technology, facilities, construction, and conservation and environmental impact initiatives. As part of his role, Rob acts as an advisor to Highland-backed companies in the areas of infrastructure and technology, and has been highly active in the support of entrepreneurs and startups residing in a Highland Entrepreneur Center.

Background Prior to Joining Highland, Rob was the Director of Information Systems for Audax Group, a Private Equity Firm based in Boston, where he started at the firms inception. Prior to Audax Group, Rob served in various network management roles for several high tech startups. Rob is also an 8 year veteran of the United States Air Force.

Rob received his technical training in the United States Air Force specializing in Electronics & Electronics Systems.
